If visiting a formally arranged garden ,: Loko u endzela ntanga lowu hleriweke hi ndlela ya kona , ku hlengeleta " swiphemu " swi ta ku endla u hlongoriwa , handle ko kanerisana .
Singapore is generally an extremely safe: Hi ntolovelo Singapore i ndhawu leyi sirhelelekeke swinene naswona swa olova ku famba eka yona , naswona u nga xava xin'wana ni xin'wana loko u fika .

Christmas is one of the most important h: Khisimusi i yin'wana ya tiholideyi ta nkoka swinene ta Vukreste naswona yi tlangeriwa tanihi siku ra ku velekiwa ka Yesu .
Many of the traditions surrounding the h: Mikhuva yo tala leyi fambisanaka ni nkhuvo lowu yi tekiwe hi vanhu lava nga riki vapfumeri ematikweni ya Vukreste ni lava nga riki Vakreste emisaveni hinkwayo .

All animals that originally arrived in t: Swiharhi hinkwaswo leswi a swi fika eswihlaleni leswi swi te laha hi ku hlambela , ku haha kumbe ku papamala .

Since the arrival of man to the Galapago: Ku sukela loko vanhu va fike eGalapagos , ku nghenisiwe swiharhi swo tala leswi nga ni byanyi ku katsa ni timbuti , tihanci , tihomu , makondlo , swimanga ni timbyana .

As the areas are sparsely populated , an: Tanihi leswi tindhawu leti ti nga riki na vaaki vo tala naswona hakanyingi ku thyakisiwa ka dyambu ku nga riki xiphiqo , na wena u ta kota ku tiphina hi tinyeleti .
Japanese work culture is more hierarchic: Ndhavuko wa le Japani wa ntirho wu ni milawu yo tala ku tlula leyi vanhu va le Vupela-dyambu va tolovelaneke na yona .

Workplace harmony is crucial , emphasizi: Ku va ni vun'we entirhweni i swa nkoka , hikuva ku kandziyisiwa matshalatshala ya ntlawa ematshan'weni yo bumabumela leswi munhu a swi endlaka .
